bulletins.title: Delayed 3rd-4th gear shift or does not change into 4th gear.
affected_vehicles: All models with A4LD automatic transmission, →07/00 (build code: YD).
problems: Delayed 3rd-4th gear shift or does not change into 4th gear.
causes: Excessive wear or burning of the overdrive band caused by operating pressure too low.

steps: Completely dismantle and clean automatic transmission.
Replace the overdrive brake band.
Fit modified front servo piston and servo cover.

bulletins.title: Noise and vibration through vehicle when driving.
affected_vehicles: All RWD models with manual transmission, →2012.
problems: Noise and vibration through vehicle when driving.

steps: Remove propeller shaft.
Separate propeller shaft at propeller shaft joint yoke.
Fit new propeller shaft centre bearing.
Apply a light coating of grease to propeller shaft splines.
Reassemble propeller shaft.

notes: Note: Mark alignment of propeller shaft to propeller shaft joint yoke.

bulletins.title: Steering heavy. Excessive noise from power steering pump.
problems: Steering heavy. Excessive noise from power steering pump.
causes: Power steering pump pivot bolt damaged.
Power steering pump bracket bolts loose or sheared.

steps: Replace or tighten bolts as necessary.
Check clearance between power steering pump bracket and cradle Fig.102161. Clearance: 0,5 mm max.
If required: Reduce clearance using 0,5 mm washers.

bulletins.title: When brakes are first applied after the vehicle has stood for long periods, the rear brakes may lock up.
affected_vehicles: All models with RWD 1992-01, with FWD 2000-04, fitted with 10 inch or 11 inch rear brake drums.
problems: When brakes are first applied after the vehicle has stood for long periods, the rear brakes may lock up.
causes: Corrosion and oxidation between linings and brake drums.

steps: Check the brake load proportioning valve adjustment. Refer to manufacturer's specification.
Remove rear brake drums and leading shoes.
Chamfer lining material (10 inch brake drum) Fig.101357.
Chamfer lining material (11 inch brake drum) Fig.101358.
